 [<span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוּז‎</span>], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎עוֺז‎</span> **verb** ==take or seek refuge== (Arabic <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,">, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***take refuge, seek protection***, <img class="bdbSeriacGlyph" src="data:image/gif;base64,"> ***a refuge***); — 

**Qal** ***Infinitive construct*** <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לָעוֺז בְּמָעוֺז‎</span> [[Isa.30.2|Isa 30:2]] (\|\| <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎לַחְסוֺת בְּ‎</span>). **Hiph\`il** ***bring into safety***, Perfect 3 masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הֵעִ֫יזוּ‎</span> [[Isa.10.31|Isa 10:31]], object omitted, and so ***Imperative*** masculine plural <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִ֫יזוּ‎</span> [[Jer.4.6|Jer 4:6]], <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעִ֫זוּ מִקֶּרֶב‎</span> [[Jer.6.1|Jer 6:1]] with accusative, masculine singular <span class="bdbLangHebrew">‎הָעֵז‎</span> [[Exod.9.19|Exod 9:19]].
